forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 63F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 62F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low 46F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 18C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 63F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 47F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Low 8C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early, then becoming foggy and damp later at night. Low 46F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 19C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 67F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 47F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening. A few showers developing later during the night. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Chance of a shower or two during the morning, followed by partly cloudy skies in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A shower or two around the area in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 60F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Variable clouds with showers and scattered thunderstorms. Storms more numerous during the evening. Low 9C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with showers and a few thunderstorms. Low 49F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
